#summary Visual Studio 2010 Express Edition Setup
@@[Home] -> [DevelopmentEnvironment] -> [VisualStudio2010]
----

== Visual Features ==

  * "Include in project" - main folders are added to projects, so it works like Eclipse - all files in folder are automatically in the project
  * Also "Show All Files" button is turned on - see [http://blog.brianhartsock.com/2009/09/14/visual-studio-tip-show-all-file/ Link] for details
  * avoid seeing temp files: in Tools -> Options -> Text Editor -> C/C++ -> Advanced:
   * set Disable External Dependencies Folder to True
   * set Always Use Follback Location to True
